title: Housekishou Richard-shi no Nazo Kantei
synopsis: Possessing a deep knowledge of mineralogy, Richard Ranashinha de Vulpian is a young and handsome British jewelry appraiser who owns a small shop in Japan. One fateful night, Seigi Nakata, a righteous college student, saves him from drunks who were harassing him due to his good looks. Upon learning of Richard's identity, Seigi hires him to appraise a pink sapphire ring that was left behind by his deceased grandmother.
characters: ['de Vulpian, Richard Ranashinha', 'Nakata, Seigi', 'Tanimoto, Shouko', 'Yasaka, Hajime', 'Hata, Toshiko', 'Okita, Ayumi', 'Miki', 'Male Clerk', 'Sasaki, Yoshitsuna', 'Hase, Keigo']
